item.description:
From boardgamegeek.com:

B.S. is a trivia game that asks players to distinguish the truth from the total B.S. "Is 'Batonophobia' the fear of cheerleaders?" "Do mice cry tears like humans?"

It is a combination of poker and of straight trivia. Players must determine which of 3 random facts is B.S. and they bet on their answers using poker-style betting chips.

Players can also draw "Total B.S." cards, which ask you to shout of out B.S when you think you know which of 5 statements read in a row is B.S.!

The winner of B.S. is the player with the most chips at the end of the game.
